title: Boston Calling 2025 Lineup Announced: Fall Out Boy, Vampire Weekend, Public Enemy, and More
description: Dave Matthews Band, Luke Combs, T-Pain, Sublime, Sheryl Crow, and others will appear at this year’s festival
author: Eric Torres
excerpt: Dave Matthews Band, Luke Combs, T-Pain, Sublime, Sheryl Crow, and others will appear at this year’s festival
text: Boston Calling Music Festival has announced the lineup for its 2025 edition. Set to take place from May 23 to 25, in Allston, Massachusetts, the festival includes headliners Fall Out Boy, Dave Matthews Band, and Luke Combs. The lineup also features Vampire Weekend, Public Enemy, Avril Lavigne, T-Pain, Sublime, TLC, Sheryl Crow, Remi Wolf, and many more. Check out the full list of performers in the poster below below.Last year’s Boston Calling was headlined by Ed Sheeran, the Killers, and Tyler Childers. The lineup also featured Megan Thee Stallion, Chappell Roan, Khruangbin, Leon Bridges, Blondshell, and more.Read Pitchfork’s review of the latest Vampire Weekend album, Only God Was Above Us.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.Boston Calling Music Festival 2025
html:
Boston Calling Music Festival has announced the lineup for its 2025 edition. Set to take place from May 23 to 25, in Allston, Massachusetts, the festival includes headliners Fall Out Boy, Dave Matthews Band, and Luke Combs. The lineup also features Vampire Weekend, Public Enemy, Avril Lavigne, T-Pain, Sublime, TLC, Sheryl Crow, Remi Wolf, and many more. Check out the full list of performers in the poster below below.

Last year’s Boston Calling was headlined by Ed Sheeran, the Killers, and Tyler Childers. The lineup also featured Megan Thee Stallion, Chappell Roan, Khruangbin, Leon Bridges, Blondshell, and more.

Read Pitchfork’s review of the latest Vampire Weekend album, Only God Was Above Us.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.
